description.full:
The search-results gets the search mode and parameters from routes or inputs,
and returns the corresponding resources that are displayed in a list or a grid.
The results can be filtered by project.
description.summary:
The search-results gets the search mode and parameters from routes or inputs,
and returns the corresponding resources that are displayed in a list or a grid.
The results can be filtered by project.

tags.string: {boolean} [complexView] If true it shows 2 ways to display the search results: list or grid.
tags.name: [complexView]
tags.description: If true it shows 2 ways to display the search results: list or grid.

tags.string: {string} [searchQuery] Search parameters. It can be a gravsearch query (extended mode) or string (fulltext mode).
tags.name: [searchQuery]
tags.description: Search parameters. It can be a gravsearch query (extended mode) or string (fulltext mode).

tags.string: {string} [projectIri] Project Iri. To filter the results by project.
tags.name: [projectIri]
tags.description: Project Iri. To filter the results by project.

description.full: Generates the Gravsearch query for the current offset.
description.summary: Generates the Gravsearch query for the current offset.

description.full: Get search result from Knora - 2 cases: simple search and extended search
description.summary: Get search result from Knora - 2 cases: simple search and extended search

description.full:
this.errorMessage.error.toString errorInfo =
'A search value is expected to have at least length of 3 characters.';
description.summary:
this.errorMessage.error.toString errorInfo =
'A search value is expected to have at least length of 3 characters.';

description.full:
this.errorMessage = new ApiResponseError();
this.errorMessage.errorInfo = search mode invalid: ${ this.searchMode };
description.summary:
this.errorMessage = new ApiResponseError();
this.errorMessage.errorInfo = search mode invalid: ${ this.searchMode };

tags.string: {ReadResourcesSequence} searchResult the answer to a search request.
tags.name: searchResult

description.full:
Converts search results from JSON-LD to a [[ReadResourcesSequence]] and requests information about ontology entities.
This function is passed to subscribe as a pointer (instead of redundantly defining the same lambda function).
description.summary:
Converts search results from JSON-LD to a [[ReadResourcesSequence]] and requests information about ontology entities.
This function is passed to subscribe as a pointer (instead of redundantly defining the same lambda function).

tags.string: {ApiServiceResult} countQueryResult the response to a count query.
tags.name: countQueryResult

description.full: Shows total number of results returned by a count query.
description.summary: Shows total number of results returned by a count query.

description.full:
Loads the next page of results.
The results will be appended to the existing ones.
description.summary:
Loads the next page of results.
The results will be appended to the existing ones.
